tasks.label: Stop: Kill 8000
args: set -euo pipefail; if [ -f .uvicorn_8000.pid ]; then pid=$(cat .uvicorn_8000.pid 2>/dev/null || true); if [ -n "$pid" ]; then kill -TERM "$pid" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi; if command -v lsof >/dev/null 2>&1; then pids=$(lsof -tiTCP:8000 -sTCP:LISTEN 2>/dev/null || true); if [ -n "$pids" ]; then kill -TERM $pids 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi

tasks.label: Proof: Live Search (FDOR)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_live_search.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_LIVE_SEARCH.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Orange Enrich (OCPA)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_orange_enrich.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_ORANGE_ENRICH.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Orange Zoning+FLU Filters
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_orange_zoning_flu_filter.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_ORANGE_ZONING_FLU_FILTER.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Orange Parcel Size Filter
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_orange_lot_size_filter.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_ORANGE_LOT_SIZE_FILTER.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Polygon UI (Orange)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_polygon_ui.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Polygon Search (Orange)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_polygon_search.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt

tasks.label: Proof: Polygon Filters (Orange)
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/prove_polygon_filters.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt

tasks.label: Git: Restore Proof Artifacts
args: set -euo pipefail; git checkout -- PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt scripts/prove_polygon_ui.sh; echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

tasks.label: Git: Commit+Push (Fix Polygon Search)
args: set -euo pipefail; git update-index --no-skip-worktree --no-assume-unchanged .vscode/tasks.json PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt scripts/prove_polygon_filters.sh scripts/prove_polygon_search.sh src/florida_property_scraper/api/app.py src/florida_property_scraper/api/rules.py src/florida_property_scraper/pa/providers/orange_ocpa.py web/scripts/smoke_polygon_filters.mjs web/src/lib/api.ts web/src/main.tsx web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx 2>/dev/null || true; git add .vscode/tasks.json PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt scripts/prove_polygon_filters.sh scripts/prove_polygon_search.sh src/florida_property_scraper/api/app.py src/florida_property_scraper/api/rules.py src/florida_property_scraper/pa/providers/orange_ocpa.py web/scripts/smoke_polygon_filters.mjs web/src/lib/api.ts web/src/main.tsx web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx; git commit -m "fix: strict polygon filters + real zoning/FLU options (Orange) + proofs"; git push; echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; echo; git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

presentation.label: Sanity: Parcel UI
args: set -o pipefail; bash scripts/sanity_parcel_ui.sh 2>&1 | tee PROOF_PARCEL_UI.txt

presentation.label: Git: Restore Proof Artifacts
args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git checkout -- PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt scripts/prove_polygon_ui.sh; \
echo; \
git status --porcelain=v1 && echo && git status

presentation.label: Git: Commit+Push (Final UX)
args: set -euo pipefail; rm -f .fps_parcels_search_debug.jsonl || true; git add web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx web/scripts/smoke_polygon_filters.mjs PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt; git commit -m "feat: map results UX + filter clarity + zoning/FLU dropdown polish + proofs"; git push; git checkout -- .vscode/tasks.json .gitignore; echo; git --no-pager log -1 --oneline; echo; echo HEAD_SHA=$(git rev-parse HEAD); echo ORIGIN_SHA=$(git rev-parse origin/$(git branch --show-current)); echo; git status --porcelain=v1

presentation.label: Git: Commit+Push (Fix Polygon Search)
args: set -euo pipefail; git checkout feature/address-lookup-ui; git restore .vscode/tasks.json .gitignore || true; rm -f .fps_parcels_search_debug.jsonl || true; echo; echo '== status (pre) =='; git status --porcelain=v1; echo; bash scripts/prove_polygon_search.sh; bash scripts/prove_polygon_ui.sh; bash scripts/prove_polygon_filters.sh; echo; git add web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx web/scripts/smoke_polygon_filters.mjs PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt; git commit -m "feat: map results UX + filter clarity + zoning/FLU dropdown polish + proofs"; git push; rm -f .fps_parcels_search_debug.jsonl || true; echo; echo CLEAN TREE: $(test -z "$(git status --porcelain=v1)" && echo YES || echo NO); echo Latest commit SHA: $(git rev-parse HEAD); echo Origin matches HEAD: $(test "$(git rev-parse origin/$(git branch --show-current))" = "$(git rev-parse HEAD)" && echo YES || echo NO); python -c "import re, pathlib; t=pathlib.Path('PROOF_POLYGON_FILTERS.txt').read_text(errors='ignore'); m=re.search(r'PROOF_SUMMARY:\s*\{[^}]*candidate_count:\s*(\d+)[^}]*filtered_count:\s*(\d+)[^}]*zoning_options_len:\s*(\d+)[^}]*future_land_use_options_len:\s*(\d+)[^}]*\}', t, re.S); print(f'Proof summary: candidate_count={m.group(1)}, filtered_count={m.group(2)}, zoning_options_len={m.group(3)}, future_land_use_options_len={m.group(4)}' if m else 'Proof summary: <missing>')"

presentation.label: Git: Commit+Push (Parcel UI)
args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git add \
  .vscode/tasks.json \
  scripts/sanity_parcel_ui.sh \
  PROOF_PARCEL_UI.txt \
  src/florida_property_scraper/api/app.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/parcels/live/fdor_parcel_polygons.py \
  web/src/lib/api.ts \
  web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx; \
git commit -m 'feat: polygon owners list + parcel lines overlay'; \
git push

presentation.label: Git: Commit+Push (Polygon UI/Search Proofs)
args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git add \
  web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx \
  PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt \
  PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt; \
git commit -m 'fix: deterministic polygon finish + debug UI + zoning usability + parcel lines telemetry'; \
git push

args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git add \
  .vscode/tasks.json \
  AGENT_CODEX_PROMPT.md \
  PROOF_ORANGE_ZONING_FLU_FILTER.txt \
  scripts/prove_orange_zoning_flu_filter.sh \
  src/florida_property_scraper/api/app.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/api/rules.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/pa/normalize.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/pa/schema.py \
  src/florida_property_scraper/pa/providers/orange_ocpa.py \
  web/src/lib/api.ts \
  web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx; \
git commit -m 'feat: Zoning/FLU multi-select filters'

presentation.label: Git: Push
args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git add \
  web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx \
  PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt \
  PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt; \
git commit -m 'fix: deterministic polygon finish + debug UI + zoning usability + parcel lines telemetry'; \
git push

args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git add \
  web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx \
  PROOF_POLYGON_UI.txt \
  PROOF_POLYGON_SEARCH.txt; \
git commit -m 'fix: deterministic polygon finish + debug UI + zoning usability + parcel lines telemetry'; \
git push

presentation.label: Git: Commit (Polygon + proofs)
args:
set -euo pipefail; \
git add \
  .vscode/tasks.json \
  web/src/pages/MapSearch.tsx \
  PROOF_ORANGE_ENRICH.txt \
  PROOF_ORANGE_LOT_SIZE_FILTER.txt; \
git commit -m 'fix: polygon drawing unlimited points + refresh proofs'
